name: Dragonkind
description: Dragonkind are humanoids with draconic features, sharing a mix of physical traits from their draconic ancestors. These individuals are often imposing, with scaled skin, claws, and sometimes tails or horns. Dragonkind are the only humanoids to live on the surface of Kragfel - their ancestral blood seemingly keeping them safe from the mindless dragons that patrol the barren moon. Dragonkind live extremely long lives, with their youth spent in small tribes before they are encouraged to travel the other worlds when they reach adulthood.

options.name: Action : Dragon Breath
options.description: You spew either Fire, Cold or Lightning in a 3 Unit Cone, dealing 1d4 Damage for each Level. Roll a 1d12 plus half of your Level for the Attack Check against a Contested Resilience Check. This ability can be used three times per day.

options.name: Draconic Horde
options.description: Your lineage allows you to benefit from accumulating wealth in an static, enclosed area that you designate as your horde. For each 100 gold within your horde, you gain 1 temporary health at the end of a full rest to a maximum of 10. For each 1000 gold within your horde, you regenerate an additional resolve at the end of a favorable full rest.

options.name: Draconic Heritage
options.description: Choose your draconic lineage, determining your breath weapon element and natural resistances.

subchoices.name: Red Dragon Heritage
subchoices.description: Descended from red dragons, your breath weapon deals fire damage. Gain +2 Physical Mitigation and +4 Fire Mitigation.

subchoices.name: White Dragon Heritage
subchoices.description: Descended from white dragons, your breath weapon deals cold damage. Gain +2 Physical Mitigation and +4 Cold Mitigation.

subchoices.name: Blue Dragon Heritage
subchoices.description: Descended from blue dragons, your breath weapon deals lightning damage. Gain +2 Physical Mitigation and +4 Lightning Mitigation.
